title: OMEGA in Mykonos
description: Immerse yourself in a mythical setting for a beautiful event, bathed in bold Summer Blue.

title: Precision at every level
description:
Discover the Seamaster in Summer Blue Collection. ​

Our celebration of the Seamaster family launched 75 years ago. 7 models, 11 watches in total, with dials in Summer Blue that reflect the water resistance of each watch.   ​

​

title: Seamaster in Summer Blue: Planet Ocean Ultra Deep. 6,000 metres.
description:
#Seamaster​

Precision at every level. ​

Discover OMEGA's tribute to the concept watches that reached the deepest place on Earth. This 45.5 mm model in robust O-MEGASTEEL has an extraordinary dial that pays homage to the mysteries of the deep. It even has a playful side. The caseback has a laser-engraved commemorative Seamaster logo depicting a trident-bearing Poseidon.


https://www.omegawatches.com/precision-at-every-level/ultra-deep

​
#OMEGA ​
#Seamaster  ​

title: Seamaster in Summer Blue: The famous Ploprof. 1200 metres.
description:
#Seamaster​

Precision at every level. ​

Discover a watch that takes its design cues from OMEGA’s 1970s original. Crafted in O-MEGASTEEL, it has a sun-brushed dial in OMEGA’s own Summer Blue with a gradient finish to reflect its level of water resistance. The iconic mono-bloc case includes the famous screwed-in crown and the characteristic security pusher at 2 o’clock, which on this edition sports a ring in blue ceramic. 


https://www.omegawatches.com/precision-at-every-level/ploprof-1200m

​
#OMEGA ​
#Seamaster  ​

title: Seamaster in Summer Blue: Seamaster 300. 300 metres.
description:
#Seamaster​

Precision at every level. ​

Discover the 41 mm Seamaster 300 in steel and matching bracelet. The varnished dial, in OMEGA’s own Summer Blue, has a gradient finish to reflect its level of water resistance. In keeping with the colour code, OMEGA has filled the rhodium-plated hands, recessed hour markers, and open numerals with a unique light blue Super-LumiNova. 


https://www.omegawatches.com/precision-at-every-level/seamaster-300

title: Seamaster in Summer Blue: Diver 300M. 300 metres.
description:
#Seamaster​

Precision at every level. ​

Discover the 42 mm Seamaster Diver 300M in steel with matching bracelet or blue rubber strap. It has a ceramic dial in OMEGA’s own Summer Blue, varnished with a gradient finish to reflect its level of water resistance. It features the famous wave pattern and a Grand feu diving scale in the same bold blue as the dial. As for the water resistance: it's right there in the name.


https://www.omegawatches.com/precision-at-every-level/diver-300m

title: Seamaster in Summer Blue: Aqua Terra Worldtimer. 150 metres.
description:
#Seamaster​

Precision at every level. ​

Discover the 43 mm Aqua Terra Worldtimer in steel with matching bracelet of blue rubber strap, with dial in sun-brushed Summer Blue, varnished with a gradient finish to reflect its level of water resistance. It has a laser-ablated vision of Earth and its very own ocean. It's also beautiful on the back.


https://www.omegawatches.com/precision-at-every-level/aqua-terra-worldtimer

title: Seamaster in Summer Blue: Planet Ocean. 600 metres.
description:
#Seamaster​

Precision at every level. ​

Discover the 39.5 mm Planet Ocean 600M with case and bracelet in stainless steel. The vertical brushed ceramic dial in OMEGA’s own Summer Blue is PVD treated and varnished with a gradient finish to reflect its water resistance. A blue ceramic bezel with light blue diving scale encircles the bold display. Stylish deep-sea tech.


https://www.omegawatches.com/precision-at-every-level/planet-ocean-600m
